title: Bug 38131ajc requires '-d .' option to correctly compile classes from subpackages
OB: ajc should create the compiled class file in the root directory instead of creating a subdirectory with the same name as the subpackage.
EB: ajc creates a subdirectory with the same name as the subpackage when compiling a class from a subpackage.
SR: Make sure that ajc correctly compiles the classes from subpackages and creates the compiled class file in the root directory instead of creating a subdirectory.
